parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| order by name asc
| summarize Selected = makelist(id, 10), All = makelist(id, 1000)
| mvexpand All limit 100
| project value = tostring(All), label = tostring(All), selected = iff(Selected contains All, true, false)

parameters.name: tcSourceSystem
parameters.label: ThreatConnect Source
parameters.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem startswith "ThreatConnect-"
| distinct SourceSystem
| sort by SourceSystem asc

content.json:
# [ThreatConnect Threat Intelligence Platform](https://threatconnect.com)
---

This Workbook's charts and graphs below by default filter to the `ThreatConnect-*` SourceSystem values from the `ThreatIntelligenceIndicator` table in Microsoft Sentinel.

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where "{tcSourceSystem:label}" == "All" or SourceSystem in ({tcSourceSystem})
// | where SourceSystem startswith "ThreatConnect-"
// Select all indicators from the table
// Create a new column to identify the type of indicator, IP, Domain, URL, File, or Other
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
// Summarize and order the data, then render the chart
| summarize CountOfIndicators = count() by IndicatorType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by CountOfIndicators desc 
| render barchart kind=stacked
content.title: Total ThreatConnect Indicators Imported into Sentinel by Indicator Type and Date
Currret Active ThreatConnect Indicators Imported into Sentinel by Type

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem startswith "ThreatConnect-"
// Select all indicators from the table
| where TimeGenerated < now()
// Select only indicators that have not expired
    and ExpirationDateTime > now()
// Select only indicators that are marked active
    and Active == true
// Select only the most recently ingested copy of an indicator
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
// Create a new column to identify the type of indicator, IP, Domain, URL, File, or Other
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
// Summarize and order the data, then render the chart
| summarize CountOfIndicators = count() by IndicatorType
| order by CountOfIndicators desc 
| render barchart kind=unstacked
content.title: ThreatConnect Active Indicators by Indicator Type
Active ThreatConnect Indicators by SourceName
Active ThreatConnect Indicators by Confidence Score

content.query:
let DomainQuery=view() { 
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem startswith "ThreatConnect-"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where isnotempty(DomainName)
| summarize SourceSystemArray=make_set(SourceSystem) by DomainName
| summarize count() by tostring(SourceSystemArray)
| project SourceSystemArray, count_, EntryType="DomainEntry"
};
let UrlQuery=view(){
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem == "ThreatConnect-MSGraph"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where isnotempty(Url)
| summarize SourceSystemArray=make_set(SourceSystem) by Url
| summarize count() by tostring(SourceSystemArray)
| project SourceSystemArray, count_, EntryType="UrlEntry"
};
let FileHashQuery=view(){
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem == "ThreatConnect-MSGraph"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where isnotempty(FileHashValue)
| summarize SourceSystemArray=make_set(SourceSystem) by FileHashValue
| summarize count() by tostring(SourceSystemArray)
| project SourceSystemArray, count_, EntryType="FileHashEntry"
};
let IPQuery=view(){
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem == "ThreatConnect-MSGraph"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP)
| summarize SourceSystemArray=make_set(SourceSystem) by NetworkIP, NetworkSourceIP
| summarize count() by tostring(SourceSystemArray)
| project SourceSystemArray, count_, EntryType="IPEntry"
};
let EmailAddressQuery=view(){
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem == "ThreatConnect-MSGraph"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress)
| summarize SourceSystemArray=make_set(SourceSystem) by EmailSenderAddress
| summarize count() by tostring(SourceSystemArray)
| project SourceSystemArray, count_, EntryType="EmailAddressEntry"
};
let EmailMessageQuery=view(){
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem == "ThreatConnect-MSGraph"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
| where isnotempty(EmailSubject)
| summarize SourceSystemArray=make_set(SourceSystem) by EmailSubject
| summarize count() by tostring(SourceSystemArray)
| project SourceSystemArray, count_, EntryType="EmailMessageEntry"
};
let SingleSourceIndicators=view(){
    DomainQuery
    | union UrlQuery
    | union FileHashQuery
    | union IPQuery
    | union EmailAddressQuery
    | union EmailMessageQuery
    | where array_length(todynamic(SourceSystemArray))==1
    | summarize sum(count_) by SourceSystemArray
    | extend counter=1 
};
let MultipleSourceIndicators=view(){
    DomainQuery
    | union UrlQuery
    | union FileHashQuery
    | union IPQuery
    | union EmailAddressQuery
    | union EmailMessageQuery
    | where array_length(todynamic(SourceSystemArray))!=1
    | summarize sum(count_) by SourceSystemArray
    | extend counter=1
};
let CountOfActiveIndicatorsBySource=view(){
    ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
    | where SourceSystem == "ThreatConnect-MSGraph"
	| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IndicatorId
    | where ExpirationDateTime > now() and Active == true
    | summarize count() by SourceSystem
    | project SourceSystem, count_
};
SingleSourceIndicators
| join kind=fullouter MultipleSourceIndicators on counter 
| where SourceSystemArray contains todynamic(SourceSystemArray)[0] 
| order by SourceSystemArray
| extend solitary_count=sum_count_
| summarize shared_count = sum(sum_count_1) by SourceSystemArray, solitary_count
| extend total_count = shared_count + solitary_count
| extend unique_percentage = round(toreal(solitary_count)/toreal(total_count)*100, 1)
| extend IndicatorSource = tostring(todynamic(SourceSystemArray)[0])
| join kind=inner CountOfActiveIndicatorsBySource on $left.IndicatorSource == $right.SourceSystem
| order by unique_percentage desc
| project Source=IndicatorSource, UniquenessPercentage=unique_percentage, ActiveIndicators = count_
content.title: Uniqueness of ThreatConnect Threat Intelligence Sources

content.query:
//Add additional lines for desired data columns
union withsource= Table_Name *
| where SourceSystem startswith "ThreatConnect-"
| where column_ifexists('CallerIpAddress', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('DestinationIP', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('FileOriginUrl', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('FQDN', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('InitiatingProcessSHA256', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('IpAddress', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('IPAddresses', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('IPAddress', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Name', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('RemoteIP', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('RemoteUrl', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('RecipientEmailAddress', '') has "{Indicator}" 
or column_ifexists('SenderMailFromAddress', '') has "{Indicator}" 
or column_ifexists('SourceIP', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Url', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('SrcIpAddr', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('DstIpAddr', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('NetworkSourceIP', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('FileHashValue', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('NetworkIP', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('NetworkDestinationIP', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('EmailSourceIpAddress', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('EmailSenderAddress', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('DomainName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('AADEmail', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Account', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('AccountName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('AccountUpn', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('AccountUPN', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Caller', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('CompromisedEntity', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('DestinationUserID', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('DestinationUserName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('DisplayName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Email_s', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('FullyQualifiedSubjectUserName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('InitiatingProcessAccountUpn', '') has "{Indicator}" 
or column_ifexists('MailboxOwnerUPN', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Owner', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('RequesterUpn', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('SourceIdentity', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('SourceUserID', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('SourceUserName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('SubjectUserName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('TargetUser', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('TargetUserName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Upn', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('User_s', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('UserId', '') has "{Indicator}" 
or column_ifexists('UserId_', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('UserId_s_s', '') has "{Indicator}" 
or column_ifexists('userName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('UserName', '') has "{Indicator}" 
or column_ifexists('UserName_s', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('userPrincipalName_s', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('UserPrincipalName_s', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('UserPrincipalName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Computer', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('FileHash', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('FilePath', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('Process', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('CommandLine', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('NewProcessName', '') has "{Indicator}"
or column_ifexists('ParentProcessName', '') has "{Indicator}"
| summarize count() by Table_Name 
| project-rename ['Data Table']=Table_Name, ['Logs Count']=count_
| sort by ['Logs Count'] desc
content.title: ThreatConnect Indicators Observed
content.noDataMessage: No indicators observed within these thresholds

content.title: ThreatConnect Indicators Observed over Time
content.noDataMessage: No indicators observed within these thresholds

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where SourceSystem startswith "ThreatConnect-"
    | where TimeGenerated < now()
    | project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Description, Active, IndicatorTime = TimeGenerated, Indicator = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, FileHashValue, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
    | project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId , AlertTime = TimeGenerated
    | mvexpand(Entities)
    | extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                      iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                      iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                      iif(isnotempty(Entities.Value), Entities.Value,
                      iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))))
    | where isnotempty(entity) 
    | project entity, SystemAlertId, AlertTime;
let IncidentAlerts = SecurityIncident
    | project IncidentTime = TimeGenerated, IncidentNumber, Title, parse_json(AlertIds)
    | mv-expand AlertIds
    | project IncidentTime, IncidentNumber, Title, tostring(AlertIds);
let AlertsWithTiObservables = alertEntity
    | join kind=inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.Indicator;
let IncidentsWithAlertsWithTiObservables = AlertsWithTiObservables
    | join kind=inner IncidentAlerts on $left.SystemAlertId == $right.AlertIds;
IncidentsWithAlertsWithTiObservables
| where Indicator contains '{Indicator}' or Indicator == "*"
| summarize Incidents=dcount(IncidentNumber), Alerts=dcount(SystemAlertId) by Indicator, ThreatType, Source = SourceSystem, Description
| sort by Incidents, Alerts desc
content.title: ThreatConnect Derived Threat Intelligence Alerts
content.noDataMessage: No indicators observed within these thresholds

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend SystemAlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join (SecurityAlert 
| where Entities <> ""
| mv-expand parse_json(Entities)
| where Entities contains '{Indicator}'
| project SystemAlertId, Entities
) on SystemAlertId
| where Title <> ""
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| parse IncidentUrl with * '/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, IncidentNumber desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade, Entities
| limit 2500
content.title: Security Incidents
content.noDataMessage: No incidents observed within these thresholds
